Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
A world with some bodies.

    • clearFile

      public void clearFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Clears the current save file, i.e. makes that file a completely new game, the start position. It also resets the game for the player.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - the io exception
